text: Terara Network is an Ethiopian news commentary organization. It focuses on Ethiopian political issues. It has faced issues with law enforcement in the country as its owner who founded the company has been arrested for 4 months without charge. The company is one of many journalistic organizations in Ethiopia who has faced trouble and persecution by the government of Ethiopia. == References == Category:2020 establishments in Africa Category:Mass media in Africa Category:Organizations based in Ethiopia
title: Terara Network
